name: Autogunner
description:
An endless runner with guns.  Pick up weapons and dodge or blast your way through enemies. Survive as long as you  can and get as many points as possible. Left and right to move, mouse button to fire.

Features:

-Guns.

-Running.

-An endless open world. Consisting of a single corridor.

-Snails.

 Made in 3 days for a class Game Jam.
